author: InvisibleTimmy
title: A nice set!
review:
This is a nice set with good parts and an exclusive minifigure.

Parts

The model makes use of two dark green 2x2 seats.

Build

The model Is simple, but using chairs as armor was a great idea.

Minifigs 

an exclusive Lloyd comes with the set.

The Completed Model 

The mech is about three in. tall, and posable. It has two large blades as weapons.

Overall

???????A nice set, but rather simple.

RATING: 4/5
